title: Esurance Offers Customers Free Roadside Assistance
text:
Esurance
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Esurance , the direct-to-consumer insurance company, is now offering free roadside assistance 1 as an optional service for customers who have comprehensive and collision coverage for vehicles on their policy.
"We believe our customers should feel fully protected while on the road, that's why we're offering them reliable roadside assistance without additional costs," said Eric Madia , auto products vice president at Esurance. "Our roadside service representatives are available 24/7 whether your battery died, you have a flat tire, or you locked your keys in the car. They'll ensure our customers receive immediate help to get them back on the road again."
As part of free roadside assistance, Esurance is introducing a modern way for stranded motorists to stay connected, giving them added confidence when they need it most. While they're waiting for help to arrive, Esurance customers can receive detailed status updates on their smartphone, letting them know when the tow truck is en route, who the driver is, their phone number, and its estimated time of arrival. Additionally, GPS-enabled tow trucks will appear on a map view as they make their way to the vehicle.
Esurance free roadside assistance is currently available in Kansas , Minnesota , and Missouri for the following services :
Towing Tire changes Gas, oil, and water delivery Battery service (jump-start) Lockout service Esurance, an Allstate company, provides free roadside assistance through a network that services more than 25 million customers.
Follow Esurance on Esurance Blog , Facebook , Twitter , LinkedIn , and YouTube .
About EsuranceÂ®
Esurance provides auto, homeowners, motorcycle, and renters insurance direct to consumers online, over the phone, and through select agents, including sister company, Answer Financial. With an easy-to-use mobile app, quick comparison Quote: s, and video claims appraisals, Esurance is the smart choice for today's web-savvy consumer. As a member of the Allstate family with an A+ rating from A.M. Best, Esurance is a reliable choice for car insurance, offering anytime, anywhere service just a click, call, or tap away. For more information, visit www.esurance.com or call 1-800-ESURANCE (1-800-378-7262).
1.
Free roadside assistance is available to new or renewal Esurance customers on auto insurance policies that include comprehensive and collision coverage in Minnesota, Kansas, or Missouri. Offer valid for policy purchase or renewal beginning on September 23, 2015 and renewal policies effective on or after November 12, 2015. Not available to current Esurance customers in Missouri who initially purchased their auto policy prior to October 21, 2010.
